---
title: "Time Management: The Psychology of Getting Things Done"
subtitle: "Professional Skills Course (1 Credit)"
---

This course examines the psychological foundations of time management, moving beyond simple productivity hacks to understand *why* certain strategies work and *when* they're most effective.

## Course Format

Asynchronous online. All materials are designed to be accessible and self-paced.
